mapper.select: select c.*,d.doctor_name consultation_hospital_name,d.doctor_teleno consultation_doctor_teleno, d.doctor_avatar consultation_doctor_avatar, d.hospital_id consultation_hospital_id, h.hospital_name consultation_hospital_name from t_pathology_consultation c LEFT JOIN t_doctor d on c.consultation_doctor_id = d.doctor_id LEFT JOIN t_hospital h on d.hospital_id = h.hospital_id limit #{offset,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{rows,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select c.*,d.doctor_name consultation_hospital_name,d.doctor_teleno consultation_doctor_teleno, d.doctor_avatar consultation_doctor_avatar, d.hospital_id consultation_hospital_id, h.hospital_name consultation_hospital_name from t_pathology_consultation c LEFT JOIN t_doctor d on c.consultation_doctor_id = d.doctor_id LEFT JOIN t_hospital h on d.hospital_id = h.hospital_id
